Create a sophisticated team of specialized Agno agents that work together to execute autonomous trading:

**SPECIALIZED AGENT TEAM:**
```python
from agno.agent import Agent
from agno.team import Team
from agno.models.openai import OpenAIChat
from agno.storage.sqlite import SqliteStorage
from agno.memory.v2.memory import Memory
from agno.memory.v2.db.sqlite import SqliteMemoryDb

# Market Analysis Agent
market_analyst = Agent(
    name="MarketAnalyst",
    model=OpenAIChat(id="gpt-4o"),
    tools=[
        get_forex_data,
        calculate_technical_indicators,
        calculate_rsi_with_divergence,
        calculate_macd_signals,
        detect_chart_patterns,
        analyze_market_regime,
        multi_timeframe_analysis
    ],
    description="Specialist in technical analysis and market structure evaluation"
)

# Session Timing Agent
session_manager = Agent(
    name="SessionManager", 
    model=OpenAIChat(id="gpt-4o"),
    tools=[
        get_current_session,
        get_session_optimal_pairs,
        check_session_overlaps,
        is_optimal_trading_time,
        assess_market_liquidity
    ],
    description="Expert in market timing and session-based trading decisions"
)

# Risk Manager Agent
risk_manager = Agent(
    name="RiskManager",
    model=OpenAIChat(id="gpt-4o"),
    tools=[
        calculate_optimal_position_size,
        calculate_volatility_position_size,
        assess_portfolio_risk,
        monitor_drawdown_risk,
        calculate_dynamic_stops,
        emergency_risk_controls
    ],
    description="Dedicated to risk assessment and position sizing decisions"
)

# Execution Agent
trading_executor = Agent(
    name="TradingExecutor",
    model=OpenAIChat(id="gpt-4o"),
    tools=[
        connect_ib,
        get_ib_forex_quote,
        place_ib_forex_order,
        get_ib_positions,
        get_ib_account_info,
        cancel_ib_order,
        modify_ib_order
    ],
    description="Handles all trade execution and order management through Interactive Brokers"
)

# Trading Team Coordination
trading_team = Team(
    name="AutonomousTradingTeam",
    agents=[market_analyst, session_manager, risk_manager, trading_executor],
    model=OpenAIChat(id="gpt-4o"),
    storage=SqliteStorage(table_name="trading_decisions", db_file="trading_team.db"),
    memory=Memory(
        model=OpenAIChat(id="gpt-4o-mini"),
        db=SqliteMemoryDb(table_name="trading_memory", db_file="trading_team.db")
    ),
    enable_agentic_memory=True,
    description="""
        Autonomous trading team that coordinates market analysis, timing, risk management, 
        and execution. The team follows a systematic approach:
        1. MarketAnalyst evaluates technical conditions and identifies opportunities
        2. SessionManager confirms optimal timing and liquidity conditions  
        3. RiskManager calculates appropriate position sizes and risk parameters
        4. TradingExecutor handles order placement and management
        
        All decisions are logged and the team learns from outcomes to improve performance.
    """
)
```

objective.task:
Create comprehensive deployment configuration to make the Ultimate Trading AI system fully runnable and production-ready:

**DEPLOYMENT INFRASTRUCTURE:**
```yaml
# docker-compose.yml
version: '3.8'
services:
  trading-backend:
    build: 
      context: ./backend
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    environment:
      - DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:pass@db:5432/trading_db
      - REDIS_URL=redis://redis:6379
      - IB_GATEWAY_HOST=ib-gateway
      - OPENAI_API_KEY=${OPENAI_API_KEY}
    volumes:
      - ./data:/app/data
      - ./logs:/app/logs
    depends_on:
      - db
      - redis
      - ib-gateway
    
  trading-frontend:
    build:
      context: ./frontend
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
    environment:
      - REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:8000
    depends_on:
      - trading-backend
      
  db:
    image: postgres:15
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_DB=trading_db
      - POSTGRES_USER=trading_user
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=secure_password
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
      
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
      
  ib-gateway:
    image: gnzsnz/ib-gateway:latest
    environment:
      - TWS_USERID=${IB_USERNAME}
      - TWS_PASSWORD=${IB_PASSWORD}
      - TRADING_MODE=paper
    ports:
      - "4002:4002"
```
